website_summaries.verdict: A family owned business that sure knows how to throw a fun pool party via the sport of volleyball.
pros: One of the few pool volleyball sets that provides height adjustments, adapting to varying levels of play
Constructed well, this net is not an eyesore in the event it becomes a fixture in your pool
We love how it adapts to not just levels of play, but pool designs as well
cons: Some wish the poles were a bit longer to adapt to custom construction

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy poles and strong net, great for retro fit
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed. We built our pool last year and asked our builder to insert volleyball net sleeves into the concrete. He used pool ladder sleeves. So I wanted sturdy poles without a base, this is perfect! I read the reviews that said the instructions were confusing, which they were, so just use common sense. Then my hubs was smart and bought clamps from the hardware store so we can easily hook up the net or take it down. I attached pictures so you can see. We love this retro fit set
customer_reviews.author: Lori Keathley

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice equipment, not a good fit in 1.90" anchors
customer_reviews.text: The poles are powder coated steel and seem durable. The net is nylon. Overall good equipment, simple installation. Instructions were a little confusing to custom fit net, but it finally work out fine. My problem is the poles are way too small for my anchors installed in the deck concrete. They did provide some information to fix it in the instructions, but that still didn't work well. The poles lean a bit, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Worked better then expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked better then expected. Very easy to install. Will be able to cut in half and now have two useable nets.
customer_reviews.author: PRJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My daughter and I cut the net down to fit our 15 foot pool. It was confusing with the instructions, but after calling the help line, we got it all figured out. The hardest part for us was finding a match to burn the edges so they don't ravel. We did all the work in our hallway, so it was cool while the cutting was done. Still have to cut back the long cords, but for right now we are going to enjoy this product!
customer_reviews.author: McKinney Mom

customer_reviews.title: Put a large (but loose) knot in both ends of the top support rope right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Like any net installation, be careful not to allow the top rope to slide into the sleeve at the top of the net (put a clip on the end of it while moving the net around during set-up). Otherwise your 15-minute install job will cost you an hour plus trying to work the top rope back out of the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Mergan

customer_reviews.title: Super vollyball set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set! I have a deck on one side of my pool that already had a 1.5" PVC installed. I bought a 2' piece for the other side and dug a 6" hole and filled with concrete. I set the PVC in the concrete and it worked perfectly. The quality of the set is very good and I expect this to last for a few summers. The instructions were very poor. I ended up tossing them and just figuring it out on my own. I'm not sure why I even read them that is not normal for me. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mario Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Good job Dunn Rite
customer_reviews.text: So i drilled holes into my pool deck and installed this (rented drill and 1 1/2" bit from home improvement store). No problems. Kids and wife say it looks great. Kids had a blast using it at party
customer_reviews.author: Stevereeno

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great volleyball kit for your pool. The netting, the poles and the included volleyball are all well made and easy to put together. My kid and I have had hours of fun volleying back and forth. I highly recommend this kit. You could pay triple the price for stainless poles and a heavy-duty net, but why?
customer_reviews.author: dadogg

customer_reviews.title: Ready set FUN!
customer_reviews.text: We love this net. At first, I would remove after every use because I wanted it to last. However, I have left it up 2 months and it still looks and works great. I was also worried because my pool is 22' feet wide but post are set at 24'. Not only did it fit perfect but we still had some slack.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars because I was pretty disappointed when I opened it and realized that there is absolutely nothing to anchor in your volleyball net to your pool. So either I have to have anchors installed or drill holes in my concrete. It’s quite frustrating because I pay that much money for it and we haven’t even been able to put it up and use it and I’ve had it for six months now.
customer_reviews.author: Rayray

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: It fit well and had fairly clear instructions for customizing the net length. It is made of quality material and should last a long time. The ball was a little too heavy and bouncy for my younger gang.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for family fun
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this set. It was easy to install and adjust for our pool width. The construction is high quality. The ball is slightly smaller and perhaps a thinner rubber but I find it easier to hit for that reason. It will still last a long time. Recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: T. Hon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and on time. Product was exactly what was expected. Volleyball was s but weak and had to buy a better quality than what originall came with set.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three other volleyball kits and this one is far superior in appearance and quality. The installation was simple and solid once the net was hung.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Kids are happy
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this volleyball net. It fit in the holes our pool contractor made in our patio. Easy to take up and down.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bratz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sets up easy and everyone always has a blast playing volley ball in the pool. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Good Shop

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, great sturdiness, and no compromise.
customer_reviews.text: This product completely met expectations. It’s one of the most affordable pool deck net systems, and there really is little compromise for that low cost. Take care to follow the instructions to avoid mistakes when cutting the net to size.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. Good instructions where included
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Good instructions where included. We chose to use a different ball than what was included. We have enjoyed the volleyball net a lot. It will fit any pool width up to about 25-30 feet. Our pool is only 16 feet wide. We had to cut the net to fit just right. But if you follow the directions on how to do it, it’s not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, and is durable. We use our pool all the time and volleyball is the norm, this product should provide lots of good times.
customer_reviews.author: William von

customer_reviews.title: Well built —Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball net has lasted through the summer with very little effort. The thing is built solid and works great. IMO, This setup is way better than trying to build your own or buying one of the cheaper versions. I really like that you can adjust the height of the net without any trouble. At first, we had it at the very highest it could go, but it was a little difficult for everyone to play, so we lowered it and now we are able to spike and play some great VB in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: nkiegrea

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The net looks nice but the poles have already started to bend after the first VB game.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Tonelli

customer_reviews.title: but overall pretty easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Diagram instructions are difficult to follow, but overall pretty easy to use. We used pvc pipe to make poles wider to stay in the holes for the net.
customer_reviews.author: junebug

customer_reviews.title: survived a high school party
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to put up and survived a party with high school boys. It also fit perfectly in our pool deck.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The net is easily adjustable to the width needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just what we needed. Fit the holes in our pool deck perfectly. I didn't realize that the setup came with the parts necessary to adjust the width of the net. That made the setup easy and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne E. Easterling

customer_reviews.title: for pool party...
customer_reviews.text: We already have holes in the cement at the appropriate place and the poles slipped right in. We don't leave it out all the time so I don't think rust will ever be an issue. It's sturdy and lends great ambiance to a party or bbq out at the pool, even if no one actually gets around to playing volleyball!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great product ! High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this Volleyball set! Easy to set up and adjust. Customizing it to fit my pool took a bit of detail work and it came out great - no surprises. Instead of using the bolt provided for the new anchor point (after cutting down the width), I have a grommet tool and used it to make it look professional. We'll see how long the pole attachments hold out - they are plastic, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dan T

customer_reviews.title: Only had this for one season. Going to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for one season. Going to have to order replacement parts already. Difficult time putting the net together. Holder for the net cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality. Easy to set up. Buy your own ball - this one is cheesy. But the net system is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Annie H

customer_reviews.title: Upon arrival we were pleased. We thought the net and poles were high ...
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival we were pleased. We thought the net and poles were high quality. Installation and net fitting was simple. Looks great! However, after ONE use the bottom of the net started to fray and twist. If this happen only after one use, I don’t think it will last long. I’m returning it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s very long
customer_reviews.text: For my family in our pool, am still not sure how to shorten it yet but we managed to get it working
customer_reviews.author: Sindy Britton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, just please read, does not come with mounting hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Perilla

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and no way to attach the net to the poles. Item shipped with missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mikeska

customer_reviews.title: great net for home use
customer_reviews.text: We liked everything about it... except it isn't really "adjustable to any width" unless you count cutting the net "adjustable". Pools are sturdy, other materials are of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: No base
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good set up,be aware there is no base.
customer_reviews.author: cantsleep41

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Volleyball is a little small but overall good
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Maul

customer_reviews.title: good pool addition!
customer_reviews.text: yes, this net is great. We used the pre-set holes in our deck and the rest was all fun. no problems of any sort andd the net is strong/durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Super long so we had to roll it a lot but it's sturdy and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Wrapped the net around the existing PVC pipe we had for the old, worn our net rather than cut the new one. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: WaldenGirl

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: We have only had it for a week but it is working great. It was easy to assemble and came with all the hardware you need. I bought and cemented a 1.5" PVC on each side of the pool (about 10" deep)and just slide the posts into it for quick setup and take down. It does not come with materials to anchor it. We have a 20 ft. Wide pool and net fits perfect. The ball that comes with it is a bit to hard to play with (it heavy and moves fast)so we bought a cheep beach ball and it works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: chad r.

customer_reviews.title: Very solid system that's easy to adjust and has worked wonderfully and survived a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid system that's easy to adjust and has worked wonderfully and survived a summer of kids beating on it.
customer_reviews.author: Searcher

customer_reviews.title: But otherwise a good set.
customer_reviews.text: The net wasn't as heavy duty as I thought it would be. But otherwise a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for our party and looks like it will last for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Spacek

customer_reviews.title: however easy to roll on both sides and forms a tight ...
customer_reviews.text: It was about 6' too long for the width of our pool; however easy to roll on both sides and forms a tight net across the pool. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy well priced
customer_reviews.text: Good quality easy to use. It's early in summer and we've already used it 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: rosy103

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to spend the weekend with some water volley ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to spend the weekend with some water volley ball action. Easy to set up and well priced for what you get. Recommended...
customer_reviews.author: James Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: The net is sturdy poles are metal good quality the ball I found ...
customer_reviews.text: The net is sturdy poles are metal good quality the ball I found to be too thin we have a cactus on the property and yes the ball found its way to it and punctured. other than that I would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is very good product. we love it. im glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: My pool is 15 foot long, this is 25 ...
customer_reviews.text: My pool is 15 foot long, this is 25 foot long, I am not sure why it is so big?
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lynch

customer_reviews.title: pool vollyball play set
customer_reviews.text: A good product. Easy to put up. Heavy duty materials. The family loves it. This is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Zichos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was great. Unpacked, installed& started playing . Very easy. Will probably be using It for years. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Charles Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice !
customer_reviews.text: Great product..... Too bad it didn't come with all the hardware To install on a deck, or info that it didn't come with it, & you need to o to your local hardware store
customer_reviews.author: Marty Mulheron

customer_reviews.title: All that it says it is
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for personal fun, fitness and ease of installation. It is all of those! It is a well made, easily installed product. No problems with arrival time, packaging or installation. We had to adjust it as our pool is only 16 ft across but it was easily done. We installed a grommet where we had to make the new hole and it was easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It is was it is...your money gets you two poles, a net, and a ball. The net and poles seem good and I don't have any issues with them. The ball you get isn't worth mentioning...other than to say plan on getting another one. It's very cheap and small. If I did it again I'd go buy two pipes from a local auto shop and a net at a local sports store.
customer_reviews.author: Toten the Elder

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Recycled after trying to put it together and damaging it. Instructions are horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Ducks Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works well, good quality, but not perfect in adjusting width. My pool is 20' wide and the net is too long. I have to wrap part of the net around the post to get it tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. Easy to install since our house already had holes in the pool area from previous owners. Fit perfectly, was adjustable and the family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product worked out really well for us
customer_reviews.text: Nice product worked out really well for us. I would have liked to see it come with optional adapters to fit more than one size hole. but it was easy for me to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Mark w Schantin

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: The net is extremely long and the polls are not tight in the 1 1/2" pre drilled holes. It says to use electrical tape to make the ends larger to fit but it looks stupid and is still wobly. Not what we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Gendreau

customer_reviews.title: Pirates
customer_reviews.text: This pool volleyball net is just what I wanted. It was adjustable to fit my pool perfectly. The posts are strong and the net is thick. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Pool party pooper
customer_reviews.text: We are missing a brass bolt and cannot use this product.
customer_reviews.author: C Van Alst

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable! No Net! No Clamps!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this on overnight shipping for a party. Received on time. Opened package and it only had 2 poles. No netting, no clamps, no shortening kit!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Kahn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poles and net very chela quality. Clips are plastic and broke instantly. Net is flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Carol Martz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that some pieces were missing to put together & anchors weren't included.
customer_reviews.author: trisha van sant-dietl

customer_reviews.title: My bad! Didn't read description close enough and overlooked the ...
customer_reviews.text: My bad! Didn't read description close enough and overlooked the poles need to go in preset holes alongside the pool. For some reason I though it would be supported by water filled pylons. Additionally, no way to adjust the width, so take your time and read the description so you get it right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam H. DeFrancesco

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews before ordering this and found one that said it was very durable and could sustain the weight of a 6' male. Well, that is true. They aren't as durable as I anticipated, but they are loads of fun! It's very hard to balance on them and the majority of fun is falling off them. My kids are having a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Duncan

product_meta.title: Dunn Rite Pro Volly Retrofit Pool Volleyball Kit
product_meta.description: Water volleyball has never been so easy! This Dunn Rite Pro Volly Retrofit Pool Volleyball Kit features an adjustable net, so it sets up in a variety of pool sizes and for players of all ages and skill levels. Family owned and operated since 1983, Dunn Rite Pool Products got its start in Elwood, Indiana. They got their start manufacturing their own line of quality patio furniture and in 1988, their pool products division was created. Dunn Rite Pool Products is known for innovative products developed to be of the highest quality. They were the first to market a wall-mounted pool fountain, the Wonderfall, and the Splash & Slam, the first commercial-grade basketball hoops product. Every purchase from Dunn Rite Pool Products means quality and value every time. Regulation size set includes ball, net, and more. Includes two 1.5-in. powder-coated posts. 24-ft. adjustable net for custom fit. Brass and stainless steel hardware. Easy assembly and installation. NOTE: Unit does not come with Anchors. it is designed to retrofit deck receivers such as 1.5" PVC or 1.90 Ladder Anchors
feature_bullets: Unit does not come with Anchors. Unit is designed to fit existing 1.5" PVC inserts.
Unit can also be adapted to fit 1.5" female thread or 1.90 ladder anchors.
Includes two 60" by 1.5" aluminum powder-coated posts
24-ft. adjustable net for a custom fit; comes with hot color water volleyball
Brass and stainless steel hardware - unit has a one year manufacturer warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars133 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
